org.apache.giraph.comm

类 ServerData<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.ServerData<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex data
    E - Edge data
    M - Message data

    public class ServerData<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
    Anything that the server stores

    • 构造器概要

      Constructor.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AllAggregatorServerData getAllAggregatorData()
      Get holder for aggregators from previous superstep
      MessageStoreByPartition<I,M> getCurrentMessageStore()
      Get message store for current messages (messages which we received in previous super step and which will be consumed in current super step)
      EdgeStore<I,V,E,M> getEdgeStore() 
      MessageStoreByPartition<I,M> getIncomingMessageStore()
      Get message store for incoming messages (messages which will be consumed in the next super step)
      OwnerAggregatorServerData getOwnerAggregatorData()
      Get holder for aggregators which current worker owns
      PartitionStore<I,V,E,M> getPartitionStore()
      Return the partition store for this worker.
      ConcurrentHashMap<I,VertexMutations<I,V,E,M>> getVertexMutations()
      Get the vertex mutations (synchronize on the values)
      void prepareSuperstep()
      Prepare for next super step
